name: Semantic Graph Node Axiom Box
intent: Declare Semantic Graph Nodes as atomic semantic states embedded into D\_ijk....

axioms.statement: Every Semantic Graph Node N corresponds to a localized region (possibly a single index tuple) of D\_ijk....
Φ(N) \= ι\_N^D(N) selects the canonical embedding of N into D\_ijk....
Each Semantic Graph Node has a unique primary ρ-layer assignment ρ\_LIFT(N) \= ℓ\_ρ(N).

invariants: Node identity is preserved under allowed projections Φ that do not change its primary ρ-layer.
Π(N) evaluates semantic truth/consistency at the node.
constraints: No node may exist without an associated embedding into some Domain Tensor.
Each node must have at least one incident edge unless explicitly declared isolated.
